name: enhance_information_retrieval
description: Retrieves information based on keywords extracted from a user's question, matching against tags in the information retrieval database.

question.description: The user's question from which keywords will be extracted for information retrieval.

keywords.description: An optional array of keywords that the user or system has identified as relevant for the search. If provided, these will be used instead of extracting from the question.

detailed_response.description: A flag indicating whether a detailed response is requested. If true, additional context or related information may be included in the response.

name: plan_campus_route
description: Plans a route within the campus from point A to point B and provides an introduction to the specified path.

start.description: The starting point of the route, specified by a recognizable location name or coordinates within the 3D campus model.

end.description: The destination point of the route, specified by a recognizable location name or coordinates within the 3D campus model.

introduce_path.description: A flag to indicate whether to provide an introduction to the specified path. If true, an introduction will be included in the response.

name: reserve_library_space
description: Reserve a space in the library for study or meetings.

library_name.description: The name of the library where the space is to be reserved.

room_type.description: The type of room to be reserved.

start_time.description: The start time for the reservation in ISO 8601 format.

end_time.description: The end time for the reservation in ISO 8601 format.

room_number.description: The number of the room to be reserved.

reserver_student_id_1.description: The student ID of the first person making the reservation.

reserver_student_id_2.description: The student ID of the second person making the reservation.

name: get_staff_location
description: Query the location of office staff based on various search criteria.

token.description: A string generated by MD5-encrypting the combination of the timestamp and appSecret.

staff_number.description: Fuzzy search for the staff number.

staff_name.description: Fuzzy search for the staff name.

position.description: Fuzzy search for the staff position.

room_number.description: Fuzzy search for the room number.

name: book_sport_facility
description: Book various types of sports facilities for a specified time and purpose

student_name.description: Name of the person making the reservation

department.description: Department of student who is making the reservation, including SDS, SSE, SME, HSS, MED, and MUS

email.description: Email address of the student for reservation confirmation, must end in @link.cuhk.edu.cn

phone_number.description: Contact phone number for the student

subject.description: Subject or title of the event

court_number.description: Specific the number of the badminton court

start_time.description: The starting time for the reservation

end_time.description: The ending time for the reservation

number_of_participants.description: The number of people expected to participate, should not exceed 6

purpose.description: Explanation of the purpose for the reservation
